p: In the analyses, we use extreme indices processed using well-established definitions and procedures [ 24, 25]. We focus on four indices, namely the annual maximum daytime temperature (TXx), the annual minimum night-time temperature (TNn), the annual maximum consecutive 5-day precipitation (Rx5day) and the consecutive dry days (CDD). TXx and TNn quantify temperature extremes, Rx5day is a measure for long-lasting heavy precipitation and CDD is a measure of dryness.
